overview:
Andrew is responsible for the corporate development, strategic marketing and financial functions of Rive Technology.

Prior to serving as Vice President of Operations at Rive Technology, Andrew served as Manager of Corporate Development & Strategic Planning for Aspen Technology, Inc. AspenTech is the worldâ€™s leading engineering, manufacturing and supply chain software company focused on the energy industry. Andrew also served as Director of Market Analysis and Director of aspenONE Product Operations where he developed a programmatic approach to product lifecycle management and software releases, as well as developing and implementing pricing strategy and policy for the company.

Andrew has also worked as a management consultant for Arthur Andersen.

Andrew received his BA in political science from the Colorado College and an MBA from the MIT Sloan School of Management.

relationships.title: VP of Marketing & Finance and Founder
